thread.title: BRIEF-Turkiye Sinai Kalkinma Bankasi FY 2017 Net Profit Rises To 595.7 Mln Lira

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Turkiye Sinai Kalkinma Bankasi FY 2017 Net Profit Rises To 595.7 Mln Lira
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - TURKIYE SINAI KALKINMA BANKASI:
* FY 2017 UNCONSOLIDATED NET PROFIT OF 595.7 MILLION LIRA VERSUS 476.4 MILLION LIRA YEAR AGO
* FY 2017 NET INTEREST INCOME OF 1.04 BILLION LIRA VERSUS 777.2 MILLION LIRA YEAR AGO
* NON-PERFORMING LOANS AT END OF 2017 49.5 MILLION LIRA VERSUS 48.4 MILLION LIRA YEAR AGO
* FY 2017 NET FEE AND COMMISSION INCOME 14.4 MILLION LIRA VERSUS 4.9 MILLION LIRA YEAR AGO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
